summary: Provides core utilities for locating and loading Ansible module utility code, handling both modern collection‑based and legacy utility layouts, analyzing Python source to discover imported dependencies, and generating shim source and zip packaging metadata needed for remote module execution.
business_intent: Enable the Ansible executor to resolve utility modules from collections or legacy paths, compute their fully‑qualified names, extract required interpreter information, and bundle modules with their dependencies into a portable archive for execution on target hosts.
